plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is probably Canadian literature, their favourite plot is probably complex and multi-layered, their favourite setting is probably Canada, their favourite writing style is probably literary and descriptive, their favourite length is probably novel-length, their favourite topic is probably the human condition, their favourite pacing is probably slow and contemplative, their favourite narrative structure is probably non-linear and non-traditional, and their favourite themes are probably identity, memory, and the intersection of the personal and the political.
